sentences.en: Andy was a good husband, and Nicky was clearly very content.
sentences.cn: 安迪是个好丈夫，尼基显然非常满足。

sentences.en: Despite its very low fat content, it is deliciously creamy.
sentences.cn: 虽然脂肪含量很少, 但是味美似乳脂.

sentences.en: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve.
sentences.cn: 将平锅里的东西全部倒入漏勺。

sentences.en: He professed to be content with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 他对这个安排表示满意。

sentences.en: He seemed more content, less bitter.
sentences.cn: 他看起来比较满意，不那么失望。

sentences.en: He told me that he didn't know the content of the will.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我他不知道遗嘱的内容.

sentences.en: I am content to admire the mountains from below.
sentences.cn: 我满足于从山脚下观赏山景。

sentences.en: I was no longer satisfied with the life that had hitherto contented me.
sentences.cn: 原来一直让我感到满足的生活，我已经不再满意了。

sentences.en: It does sometimes help to know the nutritional content of foods.
sentences.cn: 知道食物所含的营养成分有时的确有帮助。

sentences.en: Not content with rescuing one theatre, Sally Green has taken on another.
sentences.cn: 萨莉·格林不满足于挽救一家剧院，她又接手了另外一家。

sentences.en: Stricter controls were placed on the content of video films.
sentences.cn: 对录像片内容实行了更为严格的监管。

sentences.en: Sunflower margarine has the same fat content as butter.
sentences.cn: 向日葵所制人造黄油的脂肪含量与黄油脂肪含量相同。

sentences.en: The cat lay stretched out beside the fire in sleepy content.
sentences.cn: 那只猫伸展四肢躺在炉边睡得很满足.

sentences.en: the children could run and play to their heart's content.
sentences.cn: 孩子们能尽情奔跑玩耍。

sentences.en: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.cn: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

sentences.en: The research content is the pattern design of upholstery fabrics.
sentences.cn: 研究内容是家用纺织品图案设计.

sentences.en: The sunburnt grass breathed a harvest breath of dry sweetness and content.
sentences.cn: 草给阳光晒枯了,发出一阵叫人意满心欢的收获期的芳香气息.

sentences.en: There are reports of widespread dis-content in the capital.
sentences.cn: 有报道称首都弥漫着不满的情绪。

sentences.en: water with a low salt content
sentences.cn: 含盐量低的水

sentences.en: When you sprout seeds their nutritional content increases.
sentences.cn: 让种子发芽后，其营养含量会提高。

sentences.en: You will have to content yourself with what you have.
sentences.cn: 你应该满足于你所拥有的一切.

words.tran_cn: 使…满足；使…安心（content的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: the amount of a substance that is contained in something, especially food or drink

trans.tran_cn: 满意(的)，满足(的)；使满意(足)

trans.tran_en: to do or have something that is not what you really wanted, but is still satisfactory
to do or have something that is not what you really wanted, but is still satisfactory
